name: Extreme Asphalt: Car Racing
description:
Are you ready to be the best racing pilot in the world? Right now, in order to burn the tires in unique and different ways, choose the car that suits you best and get on the wheel!
Reveal your style by personalizing your car with different stickers, rims and colours!
If you are not a professional racing competitor for "SPEED TRAP", are you a fearless competitor for "KNOCK OUT"?

- Unusual visual effects and voiceover.
- Developable and customizable vehicles.
- Earn your money and buy special cars.
- Car - Development - Personalized and you earn your money.
- Realistic physics for fun challenging experience.

What do you expect from a racing game? Speed, action, struggle, balance or modification? A game that will appeal to your expectations; Xtreme Racing Asphalt. We brought together realistic car driving and crash physics and the customizable arts of underground artists. Are you a modification madman or a speed enthusiast who pushes the boundaries? Choose the side, eliminate the opponents and show them who the king of the asphalt is!
